title: Introducing: LOVE SICK
body:
**LOVE SICK**, aka Scottish duo Shaun and Julie create the sort of glitchy, modern pop music that manages to exist both on the dancefloor and in bedrooms across the country.

Addictive, high energy stuff, it’s accessible yet also undeniably cool. Check out _Bullet_ below.
